bonusText:
All players receive 40 free spins every day. The winnings obtained from the 40 free spins will generate a bonus to be unlocked by completing the game volume required by the associated mission. 
 
 Bonuses unlocked daily will be transferred to your "bonus safe". Every Sunday you can open the safe and the accumulated bonuses will be credited to the game account.

bonusReleaseText: You have {{total}} overall bonus, ready to release {{amount}} to your wallet. The remaining bonus will be ready to transfer to your balance after the current countdown timer is over.

raffleDrawRulesDescription:
Weekly Raffle Draw

Wager to earn tickets into a raffle where anybody can win. A single ticket could see you win our weekly raffle draw. With 200 USD wagered equating to one ticket, earn as many tickets as possible to give yourself the best chance of winning big! Winners drawn on live stream every Saturday 2:00pm GMT at Planetslot.io. The prize pool of the raffle grows every day based on the play volume generated on the casino. Join the action now.

Prizes Breakdown

The prize pool for the draw will grow daily based on the amount of play generated on the site The prize will be Split between 10 players

How to Enter

For every $200 USD you wager, you will receive one entry. Every entry will correlate to an entry number. Your entry numbers can be found under the BONUS section of your profile and in the raffle draw page. Raffle will be drawn on live stream at Planetslot.io during weekly live stream. We will use Google's official random number generator live (https://bit.ly/2IJevZw). Terms and Conditions You must have an account in good standing on Planetslot.io. You must have an account not in violation of our Terms of Service. Planetslot.io reserves the right to hold void, suspend, cancel, or amend this promotion where it becomes necessary to do so. Entries will be declared void if the entrant is found engaging in fraud, misrepresentation, hacking or exploitation. Planetslot.io reserves the right to perform additional KYC/AML checks as a condition of receiving prize.
raffleDrawDetailsDescription: For every $200 USD you wager, you will receive one entry. Every entry will correlate to an entry number. Your entry numbers can be found under the BONUS section of your profile and in the raffle draw page.Raffle will be drawn on live stream at Planetslot.io during weekly live stream. We will use Google's official random number generator live (https://bit.ly/2IJevZw).
